long_description: The SmartWool Solid Hike Medium Crew socks are comfy on the trail or comfy around town. These medium-cushion socks are super soft and provide excellent temperature control and moisture management. Feet stay warm when it's cold but won't overheat when the temperature rises; merino wool inhibits bacteria that can cause odors. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The SmartWool Solid Hike Medium Crew socks are comfy on the trail or comfy around town. These medium-cushion socks are super soft and provide excellent temperature control and moisture management.
